reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant, comfortable, and well-made, with one noting it molds perfectly to the body. The fabric receives positive feedback for being thick and high-quality for its price, while the faux-wrap neckline is particularly flattering, accentuating curves beautifully. The length and slit size receive mixed reviews - while some find the length perfect, others say it's too long for their height, and while many appreciate the double slit design, some mention the slits are very high. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress was perfect!
items.body: This dress was so comfortable and so flattering! The two side slits weren't revealing but instead provided a really pretty drape and flow to the dress. The fit was perfect, it hugs your curves but is flattering in the tummy area. I am 5ft 6in and weight 145 lbs and got the medium and the fit and length were perfect. Definitely recommend! I wore it for a wedding and it was perfect. The material is nice and thick as well, it isn't flimsy at all. Really a great dress for the money spent and the quickness of it arriving! Read more
items.author: Haili

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable, and Perfect for Events!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress! It fits true to size and has a very flattering cut that highlights the waist without feeling tight or restrictive. The material drapes beautifully and feels great for wearing over several hours. Itâ€™s perfect for weddings, formal events, or holiday parties. I received tons of compliments, and I felt confident and comfortable the entire time. If youâ€™re looking for a dress thatâ€™s elegant, well-made, and figure-flattering, this one is a winner! Read more
items.author: Tamara Gaffney

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Green color is misleading but the royal blue is STUNNING
items.body: I'm 5'7, 175 lbs and my bust size is around 40". I ordered an XL and it fit beautifully. The dress style is beautiful and it fit but the color wasn't accurate. I ordered a green dress expecting it to be a rich green color like pictured but it is more of a dull, dark turquoise color. Thats why I gave this only 4 stars. When looking through reviews, one made in May of 2024 has a picture and the green dress is the color like the photo, a vibrant rich green. In the last few days after receiving the dress, the photos provided on other reviews show the dress color is the dark turquoise. So I'm not sure why the color changed but I wish it was accurately shown on the model photo. I was disappointed with the color so I decided to return and choose the royal blue instead. I absolutely LOVED the royal blue dress. The fabric is very nice, it's 95% polyester and 5% spandex. But I do like that it's heavy and it seems to be a good quality dress meaning it's not cheaply made. I also added a gold concho belt to the look and I felt like it added a great touch! I highly recommend the royal blue dress. I hope my review helps others with deciding ton the green dress by making you aware of the color difference. Read more
items.author: Zoie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won't be disappointed!
items.body: Gorgeous dress! Accentuates all the right things and fit beautifully, true to size. Only caveat is, the slits go ALL the way up when you sit down, so be prepared. LOL I'd definitely buy it again and I've worn it more than once. Material is really nice and doesn't wrinkle easily. Read more
items.author: Amber T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits a little loose, on my (5â€™1 135lbs 36c) frame.
items.body: The dress is lovely, flattering, and comfortable. The fabric is heavy and stretchy. I bought a size m per Amazon suggestion but it was a little baggy. Iâ€™m going to return and get the small Iâ€™d rather it be a little tight rather than a little loose. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Formal dress odor and style
items.body: This dress was cute for reference Iâ€™m 5â€™2 195lbs 38DD, I ordered the XL. Size was just right . it was nice and snug on top just right for the fit and nice cleavage . Over all look was cute . 2 things I was not happy about , 1: the slits are not how they are pictured in other photos , the fabric did not over lap giving that sexy slit, Iâ€™m short so for reference the slits went up to my ankles with fabric sown together , 2: it smells like it has been used , the previous person left odor stains in the arm pit area and the cloth has a food smell to it .no tags were noted on the dress as well . I would have been happy with it had it gave that sexy flow to the slit areas and had no dang armpit smell . No picture because I donâ€™t want to transfer that odor to my self thank you . Read more
items.author: SDreview

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subtle slit unless posing
items.body: Fabric is thick and high quality. Color true to picture. Slit is very subtle unless you purposely pose with it. While walking you probably wouldn't even notice it was there. For size, I got an XXL and it fit great. Bit long though so would need to hem or wear high enough heels. I am 5'6", 230 lbs, waist 40, hips 46. Read more
items.author: Savannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing value
items.body: Great fabric no creasing its also a bit stretchy which is great, Amazing value and looks stunning a very comfortable Read more
items.author: Ukheart

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Split Formal Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Split Formal Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Teal Color, Purple, Burgundy, Magenta, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
